task.title: Organizing a DITA map
task.shortdesc: This brief series of steps will who you how to organize your DITA topics.

taskbody.context: When you first create your DITA map, it will be empty. The topicref href is used to insert your topics into a map.Make sure all of your topic files are in the same folder.

step.cmd: Click on the Text tab. (It is slightly more complicated to perform these tasks in Author view).

step.stepresult: Your linked topics will automatically come up.

step.cmd: Make sure to add your end </topicref> tag.
To nest a topic inside another, simply put its <topicref>inside it.
step.stepresult: You will now have an organized map of DITA topics.
